text: Sayda is a town in Mittelsachsen in Saxony, Germany. It is 24 km south of Freiberg, and 28 km north of Chomutov. == Twin towns == Sayda is twinned with: * Meziboří, Czech Republic * Sogliano al Rubicone, Italy == References == == Other websites == * Category:Mittelsachsen Rural District
title: Sayda
